caption: Please, do the following steps:
steps: Clicking the left button of your mouse and drag the pointer over the portion of text to annotate
Choose the desired option by clicking the correct button in the new window
Use the DRUG button to annotate a DRUG
Use the ADE button to annotate an ADE (Adverse Drug Event)
If you need to revise your annotation, delete it by clicking the DELETE button and repeat the process
Answer to the question written below by selecting the correct alternative using the radio buttons
